title: AED Game Character Voice - The Rogue
description: Embrace the shadows with The Rogue, a character defined by stealth, cunning, and suave criminal prowess, navigating the fine line between danger and charm.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - The Rogue voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.Â 


The Rogue's voice profile is deep ,smooth and dripping with cunning energy. He is perfect for Rogues, Thieves, Criminals as non-player characters or any Unsavory game characters with elements of criminality. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in a clean and dry audio format in case you want to further process the vocals with effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Male, Deep, Soft, Smooth

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack, Becoming one with the shadows. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

103 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 337


Number of Audio Cues: 337


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
